segments.text: I see the water gushing from the sink, what a sloppy overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the edge, puddling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's polishing her plate, foot wet and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes on the counter, untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy's on that stool, fishing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's all wobbly, legs not steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to make a mess if he drops those.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like that, so naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's open to a neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's filthy with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is gross and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
